english.segment1: I and I am to blame, I sit here in shame. I threw you away again.
english.segment2: And I, I send you my best. I try to lay this to rest, When you were my everything.
english.segment3: Shades of Grey, And please fade away. And oh what have I said in vain?
english.segment4: Hey, and I'll look away, Pretend I'm okay. I'm back on the road again.
english.segment5: And please, could it be true, That I still love you, And my loves unworthy.
english.segment6: Shades of Grey, And please fade away. And oh what if I said in vain?
english.segment7: Are you listening to my words?. And I saw your smile pass me by, And landed far from me. And what does that mean?
english.segment8: Shades of Grey, And please fade away. Oh what have I said in vain?
english.segment9: I and I ran away, For I was afraid. Afraid you'd be everything.
